languages.lang: * BBMan will walk straight forward until they hit a wall . * When a BBMan hits gold, he will pick up a chunk of the gold, but only if he isn't already carrying some gold. * If a BBMan carrying gold enters either starting platform, he will drop the gold there. You got a gold. * When a BBMan hit a wall, he will turn around and jump over it only he is clamping up. * BBMan will sacrifice himself to make a circle tunnel when he touch the gas. * The enemys will kill you, even if you have a chance to escape. * Bosses will kill the BBMan too ,they are strong and powerfull, and they will destroy everything when getting bored. * A BBMan that enter the kill eara will die. * A BBMan that falls in the magma will die. * If all BBMan die, you lose. * If any Ka die, you lose.
Like it? If so, please rate 5 stars so we can keep the free updates coming . Thank you.

Death is not so terrible... sometimes... But wait!!

Who am I, why I still exist. The vague memory that accidentally triggered,still makes me feel dejected.\nDawn comes, began to repeat the exhaustion of a day. Then I was busy, and also forgot to think about these things.This is my world, this is not my world. For I am with you, and no one is going to attack and harm you. Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. With my robes float in the sky,i lost myself again...\n
